info.name: YouTube Early-2014 Theme
info.description:
WARNING: This, along with the Late-2012, and incomplete 2011 theme, will cease to function, as Google will get rid of the classic layout (Which these 3 themes are built on top of). If you're interested in either of these themes, I suggest that you try them ASAP. The HTML5 Player skins will not be affected by this (hopefully).

Skins YouTube to be in 2014... enough said
info.additionalInfo:
Version 0.1: Initial release.
Version 1.0: Changed to be more accurate.
Version 1.0.1: added compatibility for browsers that use "#upload-btn" on YouTube's CSS , rather than "#yt-masthead-creation-button", also on YouTube's CSS.
